entry.title: Pa1mekala37/JSON-Server-Database: JsonDB is a lightweight Node.js server that uses a JSON file as a mock database 📂. It simulates real-time database operations 💻—like querying 🔍, filtering 🔑, and searching 🔎—via a RESTful API ⚡. Perfect for prototyping 🚀, testing 🧪, or any scenario where a full database isn't needed.
entry.content: JsonDB is a lightweight Node.js server that uses a JSON file as a mock database 📂. It simulates real-time database operations 💻—like querying 🔍, filtering 🔑, and searching 🔎—via a RESTful API ⚡. Perfect for prototyping 🚀, testing 🧪, or any scenario where a full database isn't needed.
